short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Hides the numbers of likes,shares,retweets,clap from medium/facebook/twitter

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Never fall for groupthink on the internet, ever again! Hide likes, shares, retweets, upvotes and claps from your favorite social media apps in order to think for yourself and decide if you really want to endorse something or not.
